short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An alternative bookmark manager that can sync all your bookmarks across Chrome, Firefox, Edge and any Chrome-based browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kitab makes it very easy to sync and manage your bookmarks across multiple browsers. It supports Chrome, Firefox, Edge or any Chromium-based browser. You can bookmark on Firefox and view it on Chrome. It's that simple.

Kitab replaces your default New Tab UI to provide a bookmark manager from which you can search, favorite, group bookmarks into collections and tag them.

Note: Kitab does not use the browser's in-built bookmarking system.
